precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
action: Click the 'Start' button on the taskbar.

precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
expected_results: The mouse cursor will move slightly to the right of the 'Start' button.

precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
expected_results: The Start menu will open, displaying a list of program shortcuts.

precondition: The Windows XP Start Menu is open.
expected_results: The Start Menu will close, and the Windows XP Control Panel window will open to the "Pick a category" view.

precondition: The Control Panel is open and displaying categories.
action: Click the link labeled "Switch tp_Classic View".
expected_results: The Control Panel will switch to the classic view, and the link will change to "Switch to Category View".

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel is displayed in Classic View.
The Windows XP Control Panel is displayed in Classic View.
action: Press the 'p' key, followed by the 'o' key.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' window will open and come into focus.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Turn off hard disks" setting is set to "After 20 mins".
expected_results: The "Turn off hard disks" setting will change to "Never".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected. The "Turn off hard disks" option within the "Settings for Home/Office Desk power scheme" section should be visible.
action: Click the dropdown button next to the "Turn off hard disks" option.
expected_results: A dropdown menu with different time options will appear.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu is open.
action: Click the "Never" option in the "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu will close, and "Never" will be displayed as the selected option.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is active.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close.

precondition: The "Control Panel" window is open, displaying icons in the "Classic View".
action: Move the mouse pointer over the "Display" icon.
expected_results: A tooltip labeled "Display" will appear next to the mouse pointer.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active.
expected_results: A dropdown menu for selecting a screensaver will appear below the "Screen Saver" tab.

precondition: The 'Screen Saver' tab of the 'Display Properties' window is open. The 'Screen saver' dropdown menu should display 'Windows XP' as the selected option.
action: Click the down arrow on the 'Screen saver' dropdown menu.
expected_results: A dropdown list of available screen savers will appear, with the '[None]' option selected.

precondition: The "Screen saver" dropdown menu in the "Display Properties" window is open.
action: Click the "None" option in the "Screen saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Settings" and "Preview" buttons will become active.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open, showing the 'Screen Saver' tab.
The Windows XP Control Panel window is open.
action: Click the 'Close' button in the upper right corner of the 'Control Panel' window.
expected_results: The Control Panel window will close, revealing the desktop.
